moduleGroup.name: BrainSuite Cortical Surface Extraction
moduleGroup.description: Extracts the hemispheric surfaces of a skull-stripped brain volume

citations.citation:
Shattuck DW and Leahy RM (2002) BrainSuite: An Automated Cortical Surface Identification Tool, Medical Image Analysis, 8(2):129-142.
PMID: 12045000

module.name: Surface Generator
module.description: Generates mesh surfaces using an isosurface algorithm.

citations.citation: Shattuck DW, Sandor-Leahy SR, Schaper KA, Rottenberg DA, and Leahy RM, (2001) "Magnetic Resonance Image Tissue Classification Using a Partial Volume Model", Neuroimage 13(5):856-876 PMID: 11304082

input.name: Image Volume
input.description: shade surface model with data from image volume

module.name: ScrubMask
module.description: Scrubmask filters binary masks to trim loosely connected voxels that may result from segmentation errors and produce bumps on tessellated surfaces.

citations.citation: Shattuck DW, Sandor-Leahy SR, Schaper KA, Rottenberg DA, and Leahy RM, (2001) "Magnetic Resonance Image Tissue Classification Using a Partial Volume Model", Neuroimage 13(5):856-876 PMID: 11304082

input.name: Input Mask File
input.description: Specify input structure mask file path

module.name: Topological Correction
module.description: Removes topological handles from a binary object.

citations.citation: Shattuck DW, Leahy RM (2001) Automated graph-based analysis and correction of cortical volume topology. IEEE Trans Med Imaging 20(11):1167-77 PMID: 11700742

module.name: Partial Volume Classifier
module.description:
Partial Volume Classifier: Each voxel is classified according to the tissue type (WM, GM, CSF, and partial volume mixture) by combining the partial volume tissue model with a Gibbs spatial prior to produce a classifier that enourages contiguous regions of similar tissue type
PartialVolumeClassifier_1.FractionFile-01.img 0 <--> (CSF) 1 <--> 2 (GM) <--> 3 (WM) 1.25 means 75% CSF and 25% GM 1.75 is 25% CSF and 75% GM PartialVolumeClassifier_1.OutputFile-01.img 0 (CSF), 1 (GM), 2 (WM), 3 (GM/CSF), 4 (GM/WM), 5 (CSF/Other), 8 (Background)

citations.citation: Shattuck DW, Sandor-Leahy SR, Schaper KA, Rottenberg DA, and Leahy RM, (2001) "Magnetic Resonance Image Tissue Classification Using a Partial Volume Model", Neuroimage 13(5):856-876 PMID: 11304082

input.name: Mask File
input.description: An 8-bit file delineating brain/non-brain voxels; if not specified, PVC will assume non-zero voxels are foreground

input.name: Lambda
input.description: neighborhood constant (default: 0.1) increase for smoother boundaries decrease if labels are smeared

output.name: Fraction File
output.description: floating point output file of tissue fractions 1 (CSF) <-> 2 (GM) <-> 3 (WM)

module.name: Hemisphere Split
module.description: Splits a surface object into two separate surfaces given an input label volume. Each vertex is labeled left or right based on the labels being odd (left) or even (right). The largest contour on the split surface is then found and used as the separation between left and right.

citations.citation: Shattuck DW, Sandor-Leahy SR, Schaper KA, Rottenberg DA, and Leahy RM, (2001) "Magnetic Resonance Image Tissue Classification Using a Partial Volume Model", Neuroimage 13(5):856-876 PMID: 11304082

output.name: Left Surface
output.description: output surface file path, left hemisphere

output.name: Right Surface
output.description: output surface file path, right hemisphere

input.name: Pial Surface
input.description: pial surface file -- must have same geometry as input surface

output.name: Left Pial Output
output.description: output pial surface file, left hemisphere

output.name: Right Pial Output
output.description: output pial surface file, right hemisphere

module.name: P-harmonic Mapping

citations.citation: Shattuck DW, Sandor-Leahy SR, Schaper KA, Rottenberg DA, and Leahy RM, (2001) "Magnetic Resonance Image Tissue Classification Using a Partial Volume Model", Neuroimage 13(5):856-876 PMID: 11304082

input.name: Compute P-Harmonic Map
input.description: compute p-harmonic map [default is p=2, must be even, positive] [default: 2]

input.name: Parameterization
input.description: use the existing parameterization in the input file to initialize the mapping (ignored if file has no parameterization)

input.name: Map Surface to Unit Square
input.description: map surface to the unit square

input.name: Map Surface to Unit Circle
input.description: map surface to the unit circle

input.name: Map Surface Border - Uniform
input.description: map the surface border using uniform speed

input.name: Map Surface Border - Equidistant
input.description: map the surface border using equidistant speed

module.name: Dewisp
module.description:
dewisp -- removes wispy tendril structures form cortex model binary masks. It does so based on graph theoretic analysis of connected components, similar to TCA. Each branch of the structure graph is analyzed to determine pinch points that indicate a likely error in segmentation that attaches noise to the image. The pinch threshold determines how many voxels the cross-section can be before it is considered part of the image.
dewisp is part of the BrainSuite collection of tools. For more information, please see: http://www.loni.ucla.edu/~shattuck/brainsuite Authored by David W. Shattuck, Laboratory of Neuro Imaging Dept. of Neurology, David Geffen School of Medicine, UCLA.

citations.citation: Shattuck DW, Sandor-Leahy SR, Schaper KA, Rottenberg DA, and Leahy RM, (2001) "Magnetic Resonance Image Tissue Classification Using a Partial Volume Model", Neuroimage 13(5):856-876 PMID: 11304082

module.description: Copies u-v coordinates and other vertex information from one surface file to another.

input.description: the reference surface file containing the UV coords.

module.name: Pial Surface Generator
module.description: Computes a model of the pial surface (GM/CSF boundary) based on an input inner cortical surface (GM/WM boundary).

citations.citation: Shattuck DW, Sandor-Leahy SR, Schaper KA, Rottenberg DA, and Leahy RM, (2001) "Magnetic Resonance Image Tissue Classification Using a Partial Volume Model", Neuroimage 13(5):856-876 PMID: 11304082

input.name: Mask File
input.description: restrict growth to mask file region

input.name: Prefix
input.description: prefix for exporting surfaces if interval is set

module.name: Brain Surface Extractor
module.description: This program performs automated skull and scalp removal on T1-weighted MRI volumes.

citations.citation: Shattuck DW, Sandor-Leahy SR, Schaper KA, Rottenberg DA, and Leahy RM, (2001) "Magnetic Resonance Image Tissue Classification Using a Partial Volume Model", Neuroimage 13(5):856-876 PMID: 11304082

input.name: Edge Sigma
input.description: edge detection constant [default: 0.62]. Typical range is [0.5,1.0].

input.name: Diffusion Constant
input.description: Typical range is [5.0,40.0] for byte images

input.name: Iterations
input.description: Number of iterations for diffusion filter.

input.name: Retain Orientation
input.description: Retain original orientation (default behavior will auto-rotate input NII files to LPI orientation)

module.name: Bias Field Corrector
module.description: This program corrects gain variation in T1-weighted MRI. The input volume should be skull-stripped prior to use of BFC.

citations.citation: Shattuck DW, Sandor-Leahy SR, Schaper KA, Rottenberg DA, and Leahy RM, (2001) "Magnetic Resonance Image Tissue Classification Using a Partial Volume Model", Neuroimage 13(5):856-876 PMID: 11304082

input.name: Input File
input.description: The filename of the input MRI file in Analyze format.

output.name: Output File
output.description: The filename for the corrected file.

input.name: Mask File
input.description: mask the input image with the file <maskfile>

output.name: Masked Bias Output
output.description: specify masked bias field estimate output path

input.name: Apply Correction Field
input.description: apply correction field to entire volume

module.name: Cerebro

citations.citation: Shattuck DW, Sandor-Leahy SR, Schaper KA, Rottenberg DA, and Leahy RM, (2001) "Magnetic Resonance Image Tissue Classification Using a Partial Volume Model", Neuroimage 13(5):856-876 PMID: 11304082

input.name: Brain Mask File
input.description: Brain mask file (either an output mask file or an output label file is required)

output.name: Output Cerebrum Mask Volume
output.description: output cerebrum mask volume (either an output mask file or an output label file is required)

input.name: Temp File Directory
input.description: specify directory to use for temporary files

input.name: Create Temp File Directory
input.description: create a temporary directory within this directory
